MotherMaximGorkyPARTICHAPTERIEverydaythefactorywhistlebellowedforthitsshrill,roarig,trembligoisesitothesmoke-begrimedadgreasyatmosphereoftheworkigme'ssuburb;adobediettothesummosofthepowerofsteam,peoplepouredoutoflittlegrayhousesitothestreet.Withsomberfacestheyhasteedforwardlikefrighteedroaches,theirmusclesstifffromisufficietsleep.Ithechillmorigtwilighttheywalkedthroughthearrow,upavedstreettothetallstoecagethatwaitedforthemwithcoldassurace,illumiigtheirmuddyroadwithscoresofgreasy,yellow,squareeyes.Themudplashedudertheirfeetasifimockigcommiseratio.Hoarseexclamatiosofsleepyvoiceswereheard;irritated,peevish,abusivelaguagerettheairwithmalice;ad,towelcomethepeople,deafeigsoudsfloatedabout--theheavywhirofmachiery,thedissatisfiedsortofsteam.Steradsomber,theblackchimeysstretchedtheirhuge,thickstickshighabovethevillage.Itheeveig,whethesuwassettig,adredrayslaguidlyglimmeredupothewidowsofthehouses,thefactoryejecteditspeoplelikebured-outashes,adagaitheywalkedthroughthestreets,withblack,smoke-coveredfaces,radiatigthestickyodorofmachieoil,adshowigthegleamofhugryteeth.Butowtherewasaimatioitheirvoices,adevegladess.Theservitudeofhardtoilwasoverfortheday.Supperawaitedthemathome,adrespite.Thedaywasswallowedupbythefactory;themachiesuckedoutofme'smusclesasmuchvigorasiteeded.Thedaywasblottedoutfromlife,otatraceofitleft.Mamadeaotherimperceptiblesteptowardhisgrave;buthesawclosebeforehimthedelightsofrest,thejoysoftheodoroustaver,adhewassatisfied.Oholidaystheworkerssleptutilaboutteo'clock.Thethestaidadmarriedpeopledressedthemselvesitheirbestclothesad,afterdulyscoldigtheyougfolksfortheiridifferecetochurch,wettohearmass.Whetheyreturedfromchurch,theyatepirogs,theRussiaatioalpastry,adagailaydowtosleeputiltheeveig.Theaccumulatedexhaustioofyearshadrobbedthemoftheirappetites,adtobeabletoeattheydrak,logaddeep,goadigotheirfeeblestomachswiththebitig,buriglashofvodka.Itheeveigtheyamusedthemselvesidlyothestreet;adthosewhohadovershoesputthemo,eveifitwasdry,adthosewhohadumbrellascarriedthem,eveifthesuwassh
